Who we are?

We build solutions that fit any Industry and Budget. We're a team of 50+ and growing, with half decades of experience. In the era of technology it is not necessarily to have large client base but to maintain customers friendly environment. For that we always analyse the need and requirements of clients, so we did our best by highly experience staff with appropriate qualifications.

Tagline work with passion to bring ideas to life and create stunning applications for start-ups and corporate clients. We mainly focus on SaaS based application, eCommerce Application, Mobile app development, Web application development, chatbots.

We are a team of developers, who are technically qualified and enthusiastic with their work commitment, for the timely delivery of exact work in its real-time. And always ready to accept new challenges for the company's better extension with clients and don't want to miss one single opportunity to prove our own selves.

We regularly updated with new sources of IT technology and IT services to make our software solution more relative, qualitative, reliable, and easy for the user interface. We always welcome our existing and prospective clients with their new business ideas and benefiting them into actual work plans for optimizing their market share.

And Tagline actually provides a practical training platform to new freshers and step forward to experience developer for transforming their theoretical knowledge into a practical frame of mind for bright shining their future with the Tagline family.
